html.div: In addition to sending alerts to specific groups or people, Splunk Infrastructure Monitoring also integrates with several notification services such as ServiceNow, Splunk OnCall, and Slack to name a few.

div.span: Splunk Enterprise, Splunk Infrastructure Monitoring, Splunk On-Call

div.p: Create, edit, or subscribe to a detector for which you want alert notifications to be sent to a ServiceNow issue. Select the name of your ServiceNow integration as a notification recipient. Infrastructure Monitoring will now send a notification to ServiceNow whenever the detector rule conditions are met. When the alert clears, Infrastructure Monitoring will send a notification that sets the state as “Resolved” in ServiceNow.
ServiceNow is an example of how to integrate to an external system and most are set up the same.
